faq.question: What is GreenBite?
faq.answer: GreenBite is a health-focused website offering recipes, workouts, and mindfulness tools.

faq.question: How do I track my progress?
faq.answer: You can track completed sessions in the Mindfulness page or saved workouts in the Workout Generator.

faq.question: Can I save my favorite recipes?
faq.answer: Yes, by using localStorage, your saved recipes are remembered across sessions.
